name: Naphthalene, NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (RH-hydroxylating or -epoxidizing)
definition: Naphthalene + NADPH + Oxygen + H+ <=> (1S,2R)-Naphthalene 1,2-oxide + NADP+ + H2O
comment: CYP1A1/2, CYP2B, CYP2E1, CYP2F, CYP2S1, CYP3A4, CYP2A6
